name: Barbarian
desc: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage
coolFeatures: Barbarians enter a rage giving them fierce strength in battle
Can follow different paths to channel rage
Paths include: Ancestral Guardian, Battlerager, Berserker, Storm Herald, Totem Warrior, and Zealot
prompts: What drives you into your rage?
What drives you to battle? Glory, vengance, gold?
Did you fight in the Last War or act as a mercenary?
